duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver specific patient care services under the supervision of a Registered Nurse.
Demonstrate competence appropriate to the role by delivering patient care in a knowledgeable, consistent, and skillful manner.
Maintain awareness of organizational and regulatory standards, policies, and procedures.
Participate in a collaborative, empowered work environment through teamwork and effective communication.
Attend and participate in organizational and departmental meetings, as well as continuing education activities.
Demonstrate fiscal responsibility through appropriate and timely use of organizational resources.
Participate in performance improvement activities to continuously enhance service delivery.
Reflect City of Hope values in individual work performance.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or equivalent, plus one of the following: Non-licensed graduate of a Registered Nurse or Licenses Vocational (LVN) program; or Enrollment in an approved RN program and completion of at least one medical surgical clinical rotation; or Certification as a Nursing Assistant; or successful completion of a Nursing Assistant Program before May 1, 2018.
